website_summaries.verdict: Though a solid wall safe, the Paragon 7750 offers more value and convenience for your money.
pros: Solid, pry-proof, and easy to install
It sets flush when installed for easy concealment, and comes with a key rack for easy and convenient key storage
cons: The shelves are less deep than the Paragon 7750, and its warranty is only 3 years compared to the Paragon's 10 year warranty

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced and easy to install. I placed this in my closet wall in less than an hour. It appears adequate for average middle class family to store jewelry, a pistol and a few passports. It will not keep out a determined thief but should delay the average teenagers conducting a B&E for obvious swag. In addition if you place it out of sight, it should work as desired.
customer_reviews.author: M. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to install when you have wall studs that are 16" on center. I specifically chose this model because it has a keyed backup in case the electronics fail. The metal is very heavy duty. It isn't fire proof but it would be hard for a thief to break into. It has two heavy duty locking cylinders and hidden hinges for added security. You can set the combination with any numbers that you choose. You can also turn the keypad beep on or off. The AA batteries that come with it are private label brand. I would advise buying some Duracell or Energizer batteries. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BSB

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Packaging material is not adequate. Opened the box and all 4 corners were bent and the paint chipped off. Opened the safe and all of the small key hangers were broken off. A small spring was hanging out of the cover that houses the bolts. Seller could not/would not help. Manufacture will not respond to emails or calls. No information in manual or anywhere on the internet that explains what the spring is from/for. Unable to use the safe as I'm not sure it will open while missing a spring. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. It seems to be very well-made, and the metal it is made of is quite thick, and the overall unit is quite heavy in weight. Lock mechanism seems good/reliable. I like the having the ability to turn off the “beep” that can occur with the push of each button. In order to avoid cutting the drywall, I decided to surface mount this unit with about 6 hefty lag bolts, and it’s worked well in that application. I drilled holes in the back of the unit in order to do this. Despite the heavy weight of the metal, it was relatively easy to drill.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Buckwalter

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and I love the ability to silence the keypad. Not a huge storage area but large enough for a couple of pistols, keys, docs, etc. Came with a few extras (velcro, key rings, multi doc holder) that were unexpected and useful.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this safe and when I received it all the paint on the door was falling off. Amazon sent me a new one. The second one would not open. Now I have a big hole in the walk with nothing to install in there. I definitely wouldn't recommend this safe. Amazon took care of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: ryork3521

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Biometric System
customer_reviews.text: Safe itself is substantial and easy to install. However, biometric (fingerprint) reader and software logic is virtually non-functional, inconsistent, unreliable and/or non-responsive. Purchased and returned 2 units with same results. Am purchasing same safe with push-button combination. Expect better results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: Great safe for jewelry. It fits between the beams behind the clothes in my closet. Easy to open and close. I had someone install it for me, so I don’t know how easy it was to put in. Now I can leave the house with peace of mind and no longer have to find a hiding place for my jewelry when I’m on vacation. I used small Command hooks across the back of the middle shelf for necklaces. There are small hooks on the door that are good for rings. Also good to stash cash.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Risotto

customer_reviews.title: Great little wall safe
customer_reviews.text: Great little wall safe with lots of room. Digital keypad works great and you can make the buttons silent. The door is recessed and made of thick steel. Wish it came with a wall template. Price is cheaper here than at most stores.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Iz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews mainly because I do research on whatever I am going to purchase ahead of time. However, there are so many inexpensive wall safe's that I just took a chance and a guess. I got lucky and chose well. This wall safe is absolutely exactly what I was lookin for...the safe does not have much depth but I read the dimensions before purchase. The quality is great, the safe is very heavy, the hardware is heavy duty, and both the key and the keypad work very well. I honestly could not be happier...also, it fit perfectly between 16" studs.
customer_reviews.author: simon8175

customer_reviews.title: Good safe but waiting to judge durability of digital access.
customer_reviews.text: Love these safes (I have two in my house) but have to add that this was a replacement for one of the same model that the digital lock just quit working. (Was after four years but consider the wear and tear is just a keypad it should have lasted longer)
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Jackson

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome. I put a few drawer sliders on a ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I put a few drawer sliders on a mirror and it hides away nicely. Very happy with this - solid unit and installs easily.
customer_reviews.author: Chad12420

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Our business was broken into and lost $3,000 in one day, prompting us to get a safe. Haven't lost a dime since.
customer_reviews.author: JvC

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Keys used to be all over the place, now all in one that is lockable! Took an hour to install. We have been using it daily for months since we bought it. Do recommend and will re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: BEST SAFE EVER
customer_reviews.text: I love this safe! I have had this installed in an office and then brought to my home. I think this is the easiest safe I have ever had and would recommend it to ANYONE!
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! We bought 4 it is so awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: ljgp

customer_reviews.title: Great value,  sturdier than the cheap brands
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well built a good value for money. Much better than the cheap version offered by tbe freight tool store.
customer_reviews.author: greg on the go

customer_reviews.title: Great choice and Easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Great safe- easy install. Looks clean and mounts quietly behind all my wife's clothes in the closet.
customer_reviews.author: Cason Stalls

customer_reviews.title: ... difficult to install and has adequate space- papers are perfect for the middle shelf since you don't have much ...
customer_reviews.text: Not difficult to install and has adequate space- papers are perfect for the middle shelf since you don't have much space you can place on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Esquire

customer_reviews.title: Great safe! Don’t tell anyone but I keep my $$$ in it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Solid as a rock. Key pad works every time. But if you are like me and play with the lock before installing it in a wall, it will only lock back if the door is vertical and not on an angle, as in laying flat on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B Earley

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It fits right between the studs, and even has a little room to play with. Very durable and sleek. Only recommendation is that you actually measure and dram your cutout lines with a leveler... as you can see mine is a tad bit crooked haha
customer_reviews.author: Antwan Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Well made, does all it claims to do. Easy install. It's pretty heavy which is something you want in a wall safe. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Alex L. Gelb

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be of very high quality. I believe ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of very high quality. I believe with a little time and effort it wouldn't be too difficult to break into. However if the main purpose is to keep kids and non-professional thieves out it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Pretty heavyduty. Easy to set pin
customer_reviews.text: Pretty heavyduty. Easy to set pin. Very hard to open. Very tight fit so door scrubs trying to open..
customer_reviews.author: Michael Aide

customer_reviews.title: We are extremely satisfied with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: We received our safe in a timely manner. The safe didn’t function properly and a replacement was sent promptly. We are extremely satisfied with our purchase. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: A great tucked-away option
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the PWS-1555 wall safe. Great option for behind a closet door. Keep in mind, this is not fire proof.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great product. 💯
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, solid and well finished. Very easy to install if your home has 16" spacing studs. I will buy another!
customer_reviews.author: AUEAAA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brought this safe to replace the one that came installed in our motorhome Got just what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Robert Grant

customer_reviews.title: Very solid build and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very solid build and easy to install, would prefer more a handle than the turn knob they use but their version keeps things more flush to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works great. However
customer_reviews.text: Works great. However, I cannot put 5 star as finishing on lower left corner is gone. Almost looks like there was no quality control check before putting it in the box. But easy to install. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not great
customer_reviews.text: The door are not sprin loaded so they don't open easily
customer_reviews.author: Michael Colon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Safe. This safe can't even open with a key.
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this safe, I tested it to make sure it worked and I could open. Good thing I did. After I put in the new batteries and set my combination, I closed the safe. I entered my combination, but the safe wouldn't open. After several more attempts, I tried putting in the key that came with the safe. The key turned halfway and got stuck. Now the key is stuck in the safe and the door can't open. I'm not sure if I was given the wrong key, or the opening mechanism is of poor quality. But I'm really glad I didn't put anything important in this safe.
customer_reviews.author: chickenbutt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use/install. 2 person install makes it go quicker fyi.
customer_reviews.author: Emmett E.

customer_reviews.title: Could use better padding. Matches the PWS1555
customer_reviews.text: Safe is heavy duty. Could use better padding. Matches the PWS1555.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Great safe for the price! I liked my first one so much that I bought a second one for me and a third one for my mother. Exactly what I was looking for to put my gun in and valuables. I'm sure the safe could be defeated if someone had the time and tools but 1/2 of what makes this safe so good is that it can be hidden so easily. ONLY negative feedback is the buttons don't light up but I read that in someone else's review before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Twigbert

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: For myself and family I've bought 4 now They are easy to install
customer_reviews.author: NW/PA

customer_reviews.title: Finally had the safe installed by my contractor, only ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally had the safe installed by my contractor, only to find out that it's defective and doesn't even work (electronics don't work). Unfortunately, it's 2 months since the package arrived and is non-returnable now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivered damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered damaged. Bent corners and powder coat flaking off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doubled the price in 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these safes for $74.99 each THREE days ago, went to buy a 3rd for a Christmas gift and now they're $129.99! Otherwise an ok safe but deff not worth $130!
customer_reviews.author: Make Luck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it because my wall was not deep enough.
customer_reviews.author: 1reviewer

product_meta.title: Stack-On PWS-15522 Wall Safe with Electronic Lock
product_meta.description: Take advantage of the unused space in your walls! This stealthy design is suitable for securing a wide variety of valuables including handguns, documents, and other small personal items. This safe includes two removable shelves, hook and loop straps to allow mounting of pistols to the interior, a door mounted key rack and reusable key tags, and a document folder that provides easy storage for receipts, passports, and more. This is a California-approved Firearm Safety Device that meets the requirements of Penal Code section 23655 and the regulations issued thereunder.
feature_bullets: Fits in between standard 16" on center studded walls. AA Batteries Required, works best with Polaroid AA batteries.
Electronic lock stores a 3-8 digit combination

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars83 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
